Hi, I have solved it by these steps:
1.$ sudo apt install nvidia-361-dev
2.$ sudo find /usr/ -name 'libcuda.so.1' (then you will know path of libcuda.so.1)
3. just copy the libcuda.so.1 to /usr/local/cuda/lib/

body:
Hi, I have solved it by these steps:
1.`$ sudo apt install nvidia-361-dev`
2.`$ sudo find /usr/ -name 'libcuda.so.1'` (then you will know path of `libcuda.so.1`)
3. just copy the `libcuda.so.1` to `/usr/local/cuda/lib/` 
_actually the `libcuda.so.1` you find is a link file, see:_
